desc: "Casual and fashionable T-shirts, we offer a variety of graphics and colors fit for every walk of life. We also added an LGBTQ+ Pride Collection with plenty of graphics to choose from.

layout.text:
We Love T-shirts! Click to explore our amazing variety of quality products, we have t-shirts long and short sleeve, sweaters, hoodies, hats, tote bags and more. Our t-shirts are made with 100% ring spun cotton and we use the newest DTG printing technology. 
Don’t forget to check out our new Eco Friendly products.
 At 22Tees our goal is to make the world smile on this unprecedented difficult times.
